alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:42PM MDT until June 21 at 9:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern El Paso County in east central Colorado... * Until 930 PM MDT. * At 842 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ellicott, or 22 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Calhan, Yoder, Ellicott and Rush. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
